Class Tax

  • java.lang.Object
    • Tax

  • public class Tax
extends java.lang.Object
    Tax class created by Bryan Carty to represent a tax due for a property and track key information

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Tax()
      No-arg constructor for Tax class
      Tax(PropertyOwner propOwner, Property prop, double taxDue)
      Constructor used when creating a new tax Author: Bryan Carty
      Tax(PropertyOwner owner, Property property, double taxDue, int yearDue)
      Constructor to be used when reading in sample data Author: Jonathan Falvey
      Tax(PropertyOwner owner, Property property, double taxDue, int yearDue, boolean paid, double valueWhenPaid, int yearPaid)
      Alternate Constructor to be used when reading in sample data.

        No-arg constructor for Tax class

      • Tax

        public Tax(PropertyOwner propOwner,
           Property prop,
           double taxDue)
        Constructor used when creating a new tax Author: Bryan Carty
        Parameters:
        propOwner - owner of the property
        prop - property for which tax is due
        taxDue - amount that must be paid

      • Tax

        public Tax(PropertyOwner owner,
           Property property,
           double taxDue,
           int yearDue)
        Constructor to be used when reading in sample data Author: Jonathan Falvey
        Parameters:
        owner - Owner of the property
        property - property that tax is due on
        taxDue - amount that is due to be paid
        yearDue - the year in which this tax must be paid

      • Tax

        public Tax(PropertyOwner owner,
           Property property,
           double taxDue,
           int yearDue,
           boolean paid,
           double valueWhenPaid,
           int yearPaid)
        Alternate Constructor to be used when reading in sample data. Used for taxes that have been paid Author: Jonathan Falvey
        Parameters:
        owner - Owner of the property
        property - property that tax is due on
        taxDue - amount that is due to be paid
        yearDue - the year in which this tax must be paid
        paid - indicates if this tax has been paid
        valueWhenPaid - the amount that was paid (incl. penalty rate if applicable) when the owner paid this tax
        yearPaid - the year in which this tax was paid

    • Method Detail

      • getYearDue

        public int getYearDue()
        Author: Bryan Carty
        Returns:
        returns the year that this tax should be paid within

      • taxPaid

        public void taxPaid(double amount)
        Method called when a tax is paid. This updates the tax, indicating that it has been paid and how much was paid Author: Jonathan Falvey
        Parameters:
        amount - amount that was paid

      • getCurrentValue

        public double getCurrentValue()
        Used when the tax is overdue to be paid. It gets the current value of the tax including the penalty rates Author: Jonathan Falvey
        Returns:
        returns the current value of the tax

      • getValue

        public double getValue(int year)
        Gets the value of a tax during a specific year Author: Jonathan Falvey
        Parameters:
        year - the year we would like to find the value of the tax in
        Returns:
        returns the value of the tax during the specified year

      • format

        public java.lang.String format()
        For presentation to property owner Author: Bryan Carty
        Returns:
        returns a convenient string format representation with a few details.

      • managementFormat

        public java.lang.String managementFormat(int year)
        For presentation to the Department of Environment Author: Bryan Carty
        Parameters:
        year - the year we would like to see tax values for
        Returns:
        returns a conveneient string format representation of the tax with some key details

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        General String format of a Tax. Author: Jonathan Falvey
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        returns an apporpriate string format representation depending on whether the tax has been paid or not.

      • writeFormat

        public java.lang.String writeFormat()
        summarises key information about the Tax for writing to a csv file
        Returns:
        csv line string
